name: benedict-payroll-automation
description: Automated payroll report correction system for Benedict Refrigeration

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && NODE_ENV=production npm start
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.railway-build: npm run install-all && npm run build

author: Tyler LaFleur
